name: Phoenix Knight (Guilded Hut Studio, CriticalDesign)
description:
WARNING: Best played with controller!

Controls:

Move = DPad/Left Stick/WASD/Arrow Keys

Slash Attack = A (XBox)/X(PS)/Left Mouse Button

Spell Attack = B (Xbox)/O (PS)/Right Mouse Button

Burst Spell = Y (Xbox)/Triangle (PS)/ Spacebar

Equip Left Spell = Left Trigger (Controller) / Q

Equip Right Spell = Right Trigger (Controller) / E

Pause = Start (XBox)/Options (PS)/ ESC Key

Created for the Brackeys GameJam 2023.1 themed "An end is a new beginning". Fight against hordes of enemies gaining power ups as you play. How high of a score can you achieve before you perish completely? 

Credits:

Aaron (CriticalDesign) Langille and Joshua (Guilded Hut Studio) Robertson

Music by Dark Fantasy Studio (Produced by Nicolas Jeudy)

Sound FX by Dark Fantasy Studio and Joshua Robertson
